changes: SECTION_11.md - FEATURE - 2026-02-23 - v11.6: Race-Week Protocol — day-by-day decision tree for D-7 to D-0 with event-type modifiers, go/no-go checklist, carb loading triggers, opener scheduling, taper tantrums guidance, and three-layer race awareness architecture

sync.py - FEATURE - 2026-02-23 - v3.5.0: Race calendar with 90-day lookahead, taper onset alerts (D-14 to D-8), race-week detection (RACE_A/RACE_B within 7 days), TSB projection for race day, event duration classification, daily load targets, race-specific alerts
DOSSIER_TEMPLATE.md - UPDATE - 2026-02-23: Added Priority column to Event-Specific Targets table and Intervals.icu race tagging instructions

SECTION_11.md - FIX - 2026-02-23 - PR by Paweł Gruszka (@mrpear): Sleep quality scale corrected to 1-4 inverted (1=Great, 4=Poor) matching Intervals.icu API. Decision logic updated to use sleep_quality instead of sleep_score. Feel scale labels added (1=Strong through 5=Weak)

examples/ - FIX - 2026-02-23 - PR by Paweł Gruszka (@mrpear): Pre-workout template/examples, weekly report template/examples updated from /5 to /4 sleep quality scale. README current_metrics field list corrected
LICENSE - CHANGE - 2026-02-23: License changed from CC BY-NC 4.0 to MIT
